post.body: I hope you told everyone to buy HP gifts this year, LOL
do you know how queasy us west coasters feel when we wake up to a tweet re: cheezburger subs?
I can't tell you how much I feel your DirecTV pain right now. We've spent no less than 100 hours dealing w/them over past 2 yrs
agree re: work email - i took it as a sign, too!
Plowing through work and creating aggressive deadlines to get as much done as possible before xmas vacation. Earning my tropical xmas vacay!
Finally landed at SFO. Twilight is most excellent plane reading!
OMG, we just made 1st standby flight. And they wished dh belated hpy bday. Yay frontier!
Frontier mgr said more impt that we got here safely vs risking accident 2 make flight. Am I dreaming?!
At Denver airport trying to beg way onto SFO flight. Oh what fun!
After three hour delay, back on I70 headed to Denver airport... Only to get stopped by another accident.
In aspen visiting my college buddy, Laura.... Good times!!
Thankful that the only thing nephew broke on slopes was his arm! Should heal nicely doc said....
Playing guess what # I'm thinking of? In the car with my niece on way to Vail. Are we there yet?
fascinating: $500M of $660M total donations to Obama campaign were made online, most donated twice: http://tinyurl.com/5sqq33
packing up for an office move tomorrow. what will I do with all the new space? it's just like home... more surface area to clean & decorate!
after 8 years, it still amazes me how much even a slight drizzle upsets the traffic flow in CA. good thing these peeps don't live in Boston!
thinking of diving into the Twilight series over the T'giving break. Plane ride to Colorado is too long for Dexters that I have left 2 watch
wondering if I made good selection when buying new ski coat yesterday. such a pricey purchase and it has to last sev yrs. 2 much pressure!
overheard in s'bucks: a Dad talking to son's Coach about why son's team sux & what wld motivate kid to do betr while son listens. nice.
just saw v. beautiful coastal sunset on a completely clear and calm day. I could see the Farallons from my house! (will that EVER get old?)
enjoying the sunshine and blue skies. ahhh, california.
just signed up to follow http://www.change.gov
Sorting pictures from Colorado trip: http://tinyurl.com/5k75hh
not loving the gloomy weather. 1 day w/o CA sun is so painful. no sarcastic remarks from my east coast friends, plz. I'm suffering here!
Saw a shooting star on my way home from work, driving on 280. Love that drive!
getting ready to head to the airport. yay, we get to finally meet Quinn!
Just landed from great wke in Vancouver. Now to Aimee Mann show at bimbos! Busy wke!
Finally out of meetings today. Now to get some work done...
catching up on Christmas shopping, when did December get here?!
Taking a break from shopping at Taylors. Enjoying a bit of holiday ale!
Braving the masses today to finish shopping. I vow to keep my holiday spirits high no matter how many people bump into me, cut me off, etc.!
Checking out new NetVibes features for flexible layouts & RSS feeds. very cool stuff. Must re-organize my page! http://tinyurl.com/6mllpo
It's snowing in Vegas! ... according to @zappos. rt: http://twitpic.com/tq99
Feeling energized after an impromptu lunch with a colleague. Such a nice addition to my day!
saw a sign this morning advertising "Iced Hot Chocolate!" ... isn't that just chocolate milk?
Celebrating birthday on island of lanai, so beautiful! Whales and dolphin out in full force.
Heading out to molikini for a bit of snorkeling..... And hoping for bonus whale sightings.
Aloha! Merry Christmas! Stay warm!
in disbelief that United just gave us a FREE upgrade for our flight to Maui tonight. Christmas miracles apparently do exist!!
almost packed and ready to head to airport. Maui here we come!
Obama to use same Bible as Lincoln for inaugural swearing in ceremony. pretty cool. http://tinyurl.com/a4eppz
Hoping my last-minute online orders arrive tomorrow. Love the free rush shipping offers but worry about packages arriving on time!
Just signed up for my Mavericks 09 contest alert by texting "mavericks" to 81595 ... woohoo! http://tinyurl.com/7aqazp
saw great homemade sign on back of truck the other day, took me a second to get it but then cackled out loud: 01.20.09 - the End of an Error
Looking forward to 7 days on Maui... unlike others who promise 2be online over break, I hope to disconnect as much as reasonably possible.
Amazed and a little scared by how steeply cut prices are out shopping today.
trying to block out the harsh fluorescent lights in my office cube. there's no way these lights are good for my headache...
just visited the post office. still in need of an overhaul, although i give them props for their priority mail service, a great value!
